minwidth.$description: defines the minimum width of the tooltip.

maxwidth.$description: defines the maximum width of the tooltip.

padding_v.$description: apply on tooltips where the nose is either left or right. the pading defines the inset of the nose.

padding_h.$description: apply on tooltips where the nose is either top or bottom. the pading defines the inset of the nose.
